configuration.querysql: SELECT BKE_MVT_CODE, TRD_LNG_DESCRIPTION, INS_TICK, NDNA_SHARE_PAR, PRIX, NDNA_FUND_DIRTY_VALUE, REAL_AMT, UNREAL_AMT, GAINLOSS, PRICE_T, PRICE_T_1, FND_SHT_DESCRIPTION FROM( SELECT M.BKE_MVT_CODE, TD.TRD_LNG_DESCRIPTION, I.INS_TICK, NVL(T.NDNA_SHARE_PAR,0) NDNA_SHARE_PAR, NVL(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL(T.NDNA_SHARE_PAR * I.INS_TICK,0) <>0 THEN T.NDNA_FUND_ACTUAL_PRICE/T.NDNA_SHARE_PAR/I.INS_TICK END,2),0) PRIX, NVL(T.NDNA_FUND_ACTUAL_PRICE,0) NDNA_FUND_DIRTY_VALUE, NVL(A.REAL_AMT,0) REAL_AMT, NVL(A.UNREAL_AMT,0) UNREAL_AMT, NVL(A.REAL_AMT,0) + NVL(A.UNREAL_AMT,0) GAINLOSS, NVL(NVL(T.NDNA_VALUATION_PRICE,COURS_VALEUR),0) PRICE_T, NVL(T_1.NDNA_VALUATION_PRICE,0) PRICE_T_1, FND_SHT_DESCRIPTION FROM REF_INSTRUMENT I, REF_CRITERIA C, REF_TRD_MASTER_DATA TD, (SELECT B.BKE_MVT_CODE, F.FND_SHT_DESCRIPTION, B.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2, SUM(B.BKE_ACC_DEBIT_AMOUNT-B.BKE_ACC_CREDIT_AMOUNT) BAL_AMT FROM HIS_BOOKING_ENTRY B, REF_FUND F WHERE B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNTING = $P{FundCode} AND B.ID_BKE_ACC_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR($P{valuationDate},'YYYY')||'-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND $P{valuationDate} AND B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT like '3102%' AND B.BKE_MVT_CATEGORY = 'FUTU' AND B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNTING = F.ID_FND_CODE AND F.FND_END_VALIDITY = DATE '2199-12-31' GROUP BY B.BKE_MVT_CODE, F.FND_SHT_DESCRIPTION, B.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2) M, (SELECT B.BKE_MVT_CODE,B.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2, SUM(CASE WHEN B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT LIKE '6111%' THEN B.BKE_ACC_CREDIT_AMOUNT END) REAL_AMT, SUM(CASE WHEN B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT LIKE '6101%' THEN B.BKE_ACC_CREDIT_AMOUNT END) UNREAL_AMT FROM VWH_CF_HIS_BOOKING_ENTRY B WHERE B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNTING = $P{FundCode} AND B.ID_BKE_ACC_DATE = $P{valuationDate} AND SUBSTR(B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT,0,4) IN ('6111','6101') AND B.BKE_TRADE_NUMBER IS NOT NULL GROUP BY B.BKE_MVT_CODE,B.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2) A, (SELECT I.ID_INS_CODE, D.NDNA_VALUATION_PRICE, NDNA_SHARE_PAR, D.NDNA_FUND_ACTUAL_PRICE, D.ID_NDNA_POS_STATUS_2 FROM NAV_DETAILED_NET_ASSET D, REF_INSTRUMENT I WHERE D.KEY_NAV_SEQUENCE IN (SELECT MAX(E.KEY_NAV_SEQUENCE) FROM NAV_EVENT E WHERE E.NEVE_FUND_CODE = $P{FundCode} AND E.ID_NEVE_NAV_DATE = $P{valuationDate} AND E.NEVE_VALIDITY_STATUS IN ('Y','R') AND E.ID_NEVE_NAV_TYPE = 'MAIN') AND D.ID_NDNA_STOCK = 'AD1' AND I.ID_INS_CATEGORY = 'FUTU' AND D.KEY_REF_INSTRUMENT = I.KEY_REF_INSTRUMENT) T, (SELECT DISTINCT I.ID_INS_CODE, D.NDNA_VALUATION_PRICE FROM NAV_DETAILED_NET_ASSET D, REF_INSTRUMENT I WHERE D.KEY_NAV_SEQUENCE IN (SELECT MAX(E.KEY_NAV_SEQUENCE) FROM NAV_EVENT E WHERE E.NEVE_FUND_CODE = $P{FundCode} AND E.ID_NEVE_NAV_DATE = $P{valuationDate}-1 AND E.NEVE_VALIDITY_STATUS IN ('Y','R') AND E.ID_NEVE_NAV_TYPE = 'MAIN') AND D.ID_NDNA_STOCK = 'AD1' AND I.ID_INS_CATEGORY = 'FUTU' AND D.KEY_REF_INSTRUMENT = I.KEY_REF_INSTRUMENT) T_1, (select trim(CODE_VALEUR) CODE_VALEUR, COURS_VALEUR from cours_serveur@gp3core_gp3dba where categorie_valeur = 'FUTU' AND TYPE_COURS_REQUETE = 'CLOT' AND DATE '1752-9-14' - HISTO_DATE_COTATION = $P{valuationDate}) TRA WHERE M.BKE_MVT_CODE = A.BKE_MVT_CODE(+) AND M.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2 = A.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2(+) AND M.BKE_MVT_CODE = I.ID_INS_CODE AND I.ID_INS_CATEGORY = 'FUTU' AND I.INS_END_VALIDITY = DATE '2199-12-31' AND I.KEY_REF_INSTRUMENT = C.KEY_REF_INSTRUMENT AND C.ID_CRI_FAMILY = 'DCL' AND 'OCR\ALCD\\'||C.CRI_CRITERIA_3 = TD.ID_TRD_TRANSLATION(+) ---第三 斜Q是自己加的 转义 AND TD.ID_TRD_LANGUE(+) = 'ZH' AND M.BKE_MVT_CODE = T.ID_INS_CODE(+) AND M.BKE_MVT_POS_STATUS_2 = T.ID_NDNA_POS_STATUS_2(+) AND M.BKE_MVT_CODE = T_1.ID_INS_CODE(+) AND M.BKE_MVT_CODE = TRA.CODE_VALEUR(+)) WHERE NDNA_SHARE_PAR <> 0 OR PRIX<>0 OR NDNA_FUND_DIRTY_VALUE <> 0 OR REAL_AMT <> 0 OR UNREAL_AMT <> 0 OR PRICE_T_1 <> 0 ORDER BY BKE_MVT_CODE
